Author: UnbirthdayHatter
Name: Social Morpho
Punchline: Track social quests with your fellow adventurers
Description: An FFXIV Dalamud plugin that adds an immersive social quest system. Create quests to track social interactions with party members, such as 'Get dotted three times' or 'Hug 4 players'. Features FFXIV-styled UI and persistent quest tracking.
